thread.title: MsTam MamaBear
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by MsTam MamaBear

author: MsTam MamaBear
title: MsTam MamaBear
text: It would be nice if you called customers when their orders can't be filled because of quantities, colors, and other issues rather than email them. Most customers don't check their email as frequently as you thought and you my need a response regarding their order. Orders are getting delayed because customers aren't aware of these emails in time :
